page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: IN OUR AREA WE HAVE QUITE A LOT OF SMALL INDUSTRIES.THE LARGEST IS AGRICULTURE AND ITS SUPPLY AGENCIES. OFFICE WORK AND THE WHOLESALE/RETAIL TRADES ARE THE SECOND LARGEST WORK AREAS,TOURISM IS THE THIRD. IN NARBERTH WE HAVE FOUR BUILDERS THEIR NAMES ARE... WEBB,PRITCHARD,WARLOW AND WALTERS. WEST WALES CONSTRUCTION DO THE BIGGER JOBS OF BUILDING AND THEY BUILD FLATS AND HOUSES SHOPS AND FARM BUILDINGS AND SOMETIMES ROAD WORKS.AT THE MOMENT DOWN IN CANASTON WOODS THERE ARE FORESTERS CUTTING DOWN TREES AND MAKING FENCE_POSTS.WE HAVE ONE TRAVEL_AGENT IN NARBERTH.IT IS NEAR THE TOWN CLOCK IN THE TOWN CENTRE.WE HAVE FOUR CARAVAN SITES, AT NOBLE COURT,REDSTONE RD.,ALLENSBANK,THE BRIDGE AND THE DINGLE.THE TOURIST INDUSTRY IS A SEASONAL SOURCE OF WORK.
